descriptor.name: Hawkins 2.5 Cups Tadka Pan (STP25)
descriptor.long_desc: Safety is paramount with the Hawkins Tri-Ply Stainless Steel Tadka Pan, featuring a safe design that ensures 100% attention to your cooking. Crafted from food-grade 18/8 superior stainless steel, the Pan provides a hygienic cooking surface, ensuring that your tadka is safe and free from contaminants. Experience unparalleled convenience with the 360-degree rim all around the pan, allowing you to stir and pour hot oil and masalas safely and effortlessly. Enjoy long-lasting durability with sturdy stainless steel rivets that ensure the handle will not loosen over time. Whether you're stirring, pouring, or serving, rest assured that the handle remains secure and stable, providing you with confidence and control during cooking. Experience superior heat distribution and quick heating with the extra-thick Tri-Ply Stainless Steel construction. Stay comfortable while cooking with the stay-cool stainless steel handle, designed to remain cool to the touch even when the pan is hot.

descriptor.name: Hawkins 1.5 Cups Tadka Pan (STP15)
descriptor.long_desc: Safety is paramount with the Hawkins Tri-Ply Stainless Steel Tadka Pan, featuring a safe design that ensures 100% attention to your cooking. Experience superior heat distribution and quick heating with the extra-thick Tri-Ply Stainless Steel construction. Stay comfortable while cooking with the stay-cool stainless steel handle, designed to remain cool to the touch even when the pan is hot.

descriptor.name: Hawkins Futura 2 Cups Tadka Pan (ATP2)
descriptor.short_desc: Description - Hawkins Futura 2 Cups Tadka Pan (ATP2)
descriptor.long_desc: Hawkins Futura Tadka Pan is crafted from Hard Anodised Aluminium. Resistant to pitting, tarnishing, and corrosion, it promises to maintain its pristine appearance for years to come. With a thickness of 3.25 mm, the Futura Tadka Pan exemplifies durability. Whether you're preparing a quick tadka infusion or melting butter to perfection, this sturdy pan is offering consistent performance with every use. Designed specifically for the art of tadka, or spice tempering, the Pan excels at rapid heating of flavorful spices, allowing you to unlock the full depth of aromas and flavors in your recipes. From cumin seeds to mustard seeds, experience the magic of perfectly tempered spices. It is useful for melting butter for drizzling over popcorn or reheating small quantities of food for a quick meal. Designed to stay cool to the touch, the sturdy stainless steel handle ensures a comfortable grip. It is compatible with domestic gas, kerosene, electric, ceramic, and halogen cooktops.

descriptor.name: Hawkins Futura 1 Cup Tadka Pan (ATP1)
descriptor.short_desc: Description - Hawkins Futura 1 Cup Tadka Pan (ATP1)
descriptor.long_desc: Hawkins Futura Tadka Pan is crafted from Hard Anodised Aluminium. descriptor.name: Hawkins Futura 22 cm Tava (AT22)
descriptor.long_desc: Hawkins Futura Tava is crafted from Hard Anodised Aluminium, ensuring it remains tough and resilient for years to come. It resists pitting, tarnishing, and corrosion, maintaining a pristine appearance even with frequent use. The hard-anodized surface is not only durable but also non-toxic, non-staining, and non-reactive with foods, guaranteeing the purity of flavors in every dish. Experience unparalleled efficiency with the thermal-efficient design of the Futura Tava, which rapidly and evenly distributes heat. This versatile cookware ensures consistent cooking performance without the risk of hot spots. Equipped with a stainless steel handle, the Futura Tava offers both convenience and safety. Designed to stay cool to the touch, the handle provides a comfortable grip, enhancing maneuverability in the kitchen. Versatility is key with the Hawkins Futura Tava, as it can be utilized on a variety of cooking surfaces including domestic gas, kerosene, electric, ceramic, and halogen stoves.

descriptor.name: Hawkins Futura 17 cm Frying Pan (NF17)
descriptor.short_desc: Description - Hawkins Futura 17 cm Frying Pan (NF17)
descriptor.long_desc: Hawkins Futura Frying Pan is crafted with precision. This frying pan features a PFOA Free Non-stick coating seamlessly bonded to tough Hard Anodised Aluminium, ensuring durability and superior cooking performance. Renowned for its heavy gauge construction and impeccable balance, the Futura Frying Pan makes cooking effortless and results consistently delicious. Whether you prefer cooking with minimal oil or no butter at all, this frying pan delivers outstanding performance without compromising on taste. Experience comfort and convenience like never before with the stay-cool plastic handle, ensuring a secure grip and comfortable maneuverability. Versatility meets compatibility with this Frying Pan, suitable for use on a wide range of stovetops including gas, kerosene, electric, ceramic, and halogen. From traditional delights like Akuri and Alu Tikki to international favorites like French Toast and Pancakes, this frying pan caters to a myriad of culinary creations.

descriptor.name: Hawkins Futura 17 cm Frying Pan (AF17)
descriptor.short_desc: Description - Hawkins Futura 17 cm Frying Pan (AF17)
descriptor.long_desc: Elevate your cooking prowess with the Futura Hard Anodised Frying Pans, boasting an extra thickness. Designed to prevent burning with minimal heat control, these frying pans are a game-changer in your kitchen. The substantial thickness facilitates even heat distribution. Experience the convenience of quick and uniform heat conductivity, enabling you to achieve the perfect dish without the fear of scorching. The sturdy plastic handles, designed to stay cool, add to the comfort and safety of these frying pans. The Hard Anodised finish doesn't just offer durability; it stays new for years. Versatility is a key feature of the Futura Hard Anodised Frying Pans, as they seamlessly adapt to various stovetops. Whether you're using domestic gas, kerosene, electric, ceramic, or halogen stoves, these frying pans are your reliable culinary companions. Embrace the fusion of innovation and tradition, where thoughtful design and practical functionality converge to enhance your cooking experience.

descriptor.name: Hawkins Futura 1 Litre Saucepan (AS10)
descriptor.long_desc: Introducing the Hard Anodised Saucepan with the revolutionary EZEE-POUR® technology. This saucepan is more than just a vessel; it's an embodiment of technological advancement, featuring a specially designed spout for easy pouring with minimal dripping. Ideal for making soups, tea, or other beverages, and boiling milk, the EZEE-POUR® spout ensures precision and convenience in every pour. These saucepans feature strong, stay-cool plastic handles fixed on sturdy stainless steel brackets, permanently riveted to the pans. The result is a durable and comfortable grip, providing stability and safety during cooking. The enduring Hard Anodised finish not only adds a touch of sophistication but ensures these pots maintain a fresh and new appearance for years. Versatility is a key feature of the Hard Anodised Saucepan, seamlessly adapting to various cooktops, including domestic gas, electric, ceramic, and halogen options.

descriptor.name: Hawkins 0.75 Litre Mini Casserole with Lid (DCG75G)
descriptor.short_desc: Description - Hawkins 0.75 Litre Mini Casserole with Lid (DCG75G)
descriptor.long_desc: Hawkins Mini Casserole is crafted with pressure die-cast technology. It ensures durability and efficient heat distribution. The interior boasts a special nonstick ceramic coating that withstands high heat, making it metal spoon friendly, scratch-resistant, and stain-resistant for hassle-free cooking and cleaning. The grey ceramic exterior adds a pop of color and also maintains its stain-free, lustrous appearance for years. It works on gas, electric, ceramic, and halogen cooktops. From reheating leftovers to cooking small portions of a favorite dishes, this pan is ideal for quick and efficient meal preparation. Its metal body and coating are designed to withstand high oven temperatures for baking, ensuring consistent and delicious results. Cook, bake, and serve in the same dish, wheather cooking meals or serving a variety of nibbles. A toughened heat-proof Glass Lid for monitoring food during cooking and serving, speeds up the cooking process, tenderizes food, and enhances flavors.

descriptor.name: Hawkins Futura 22 cm Flat Tava (AFT22)
descriptor.short_desc: Description - Hawkins Futura 22 cm Flat Tava (AFT22)
descriptor.long_desc: Introducing the Futura Flat Tava, a versatile kitchen essential. This Tava is a gateway to crafting traditional Indian delights like roti, phulka, and paratha, all staples in Indian cuisine. Beyond flatbreads, the Flat Tava excels in cooking cutlets, eggs, pancakes, French toasts, griddle cakes, and more. The flat cooking surface is ideal for liquid batters, ensuring an even spread and retention of shape. The rim minimizes spillage, enhancing safety and control, making it a preferred choice for South Indian snacks like dosa and uttapam, as well as pancakes. The Futura Hard Anodised Flat Tava stands out for its heavy gauge and well-balanced design. The stay-cool stainless steel handles add to the convenience, ensuring comfort and safety. The Hard Anodised finish promises durability and ensures a pristine appearance, looking new for years to come. The Futura Flat Tava seamlessly adapts to various cooktops, including domestic gas, electric, ceramic, and halogen options.
